name: Fox Trot
description:
Get ready to run, jump, duck, and dodge your way through the forest with our newest game, Fox Trot! Play as a speedy little fox on a mission to collect as many coins as possible while avoiding dangerous animals and obstacles in your path.

With each passing moment, the forest changes and the obstacles get trickier, so you'll need to be quick on your feet (or paws) to survive. Use your sharp reflexes and lightning-fast instincts to dodge everything from trees and rocks to sneaky critters and raging bears.
But don't worry, you're not alone on this journey. Along the way, you'll get power ups, to help add to your score while unlocking cool new skins with the coins you collect.

On top of all that you will also have the opportunity to collect daily login rewards as well as complete daily challenges!

So what are you waiting for? It's time to channel your inner fox and show the world what you're made of. With endless gameplay and infinite fun, Fox Trot is the perfect game for anyone who loves a good challenge and a lot of laughs.

Download it now and let the running begin!
